questions.question: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.

answers.answer: Hi friend, that's wonderful you make a great dinner for your birthday, but it's not cool that you has all the work if you want I'll be there to help you. What can I do ? I like drink dance laugh then I can create the atmosphere and fun.If you want I'll say to my sister to come with me, because she likes working cooking washing then with us two, everything will be perfect. See you soon
